content.raw:
looks good just has a question about redo

- user moves car to x=0 (t=0) ->  plugins drives it to x=1 (t=1) -> user hits undo to brings car back to x=0 (t=0) -> plugin drives it to x=2  (t=2) -> user hits redo - what happens here?

will redo also go back in time or has no effect here?
